dictionary.name: _code
dictionary.string: "uniform vec3 flashColor = vec3(1, 0, 0); &#000a;uniform float flashTime = 8;&#000a;&#000a;vec4 col = tex(TEXTURE, UV);&#000a;if(col.a < 0.0) {&#000a; vec3 deltaColor = (flashColor - col.xyz) * sin(TIME * flashTime) * col.a;&#000a; col.xyz += deltaColor;&#000a;}&#000a;COLOR = SRC_COLOR * col;&#000a;&#000a;"
